channel.title: The Zeta Calculus
channel.description: Collected writings and ongoing work on the zeta calculus.

item.title: Master's thesis
item.dc:creator: Nicklas Botö
item.description: We've have be asked to share our thesis work somwhere, and it is probably easiest to put it here.

item.title: QPL2023 Poster
item.dc:creator: Nicklas Botö
item.description: We presented a poster on Zeta at Quantum Physics and Logic 2023 at Institut Henri Poincaré! The PDF of the poster can be found here.

item.title: ICFP/PLanQC Poster
item.dc:creator: Nicklas Botö
item.description: Our poster submission for the Programming Languages for Quantum Computation (PLanQC) got accepted! The workshop is hosted at the International Conference on Functional Programming (ICFP) in Ljubljana, Slovenia. The poster features a general overview of the \(\zeta\)-calculus with examples in the ZX-calculus and higher orders of computation.
